original_text: ‘Our father died in the desert. But he was not in Korah's group of men who came together to speak against the Lord. He died in the desert because of his own sin, and he did not have any sons.
korean_text: 우리 아버지가 광야에서 죽었으나 여호와를 거슬러 모인 고라의 무리에 들지 아니하고 자기 죄로 죽었고 아들이 없나이다

sentences.original_text: Our father died in the desert.
But he was not in Korah's group of men
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 고라의 사람들 그룹에 속하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: who came together to speak against the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 함께 모여 여호와를 반대하여 말한 사람들입니다.

sentences.original_text: He died in the desert because of his own sin,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 자신의 죄 때문에 광야에서 죽었습니다,

sentences.original_text: and he did not have any sons.
